column4: does anyone know why a sound device would "disappear" after an upgrade to Gutsy?
by disappear I mean that nothing is shown when "asoundconf list" is used
the new gutsy kernel has a bug (regression)
so, to fix my friend's situation I should go re-install an older kernel then? (should I go feisty or just one lower version from Gutsy, such as a development period one?)
